structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth
Executive Office Of Labor And Workforce Development

law.catch_line: Deputy Director Of Apprentice Training; Appointments
law.text: [ Text of section effective until March 27, 2011. For text effective March 27, 2011, see below.] The director, subject to approval by the governor, shall appoint a deputy director of apprentice training. The deputy director may appoint and employ such clerical, technical and professional assistance as shall be necessary to effectuate the purposes of this chapter, and may utilize any federal funds available to aid in the administration of this chapter. Chapter 23: Deputy director of apprentice training; appointments [ Text of section as amended by 2011, 3, Sec. 49 effective March 27, 2011. For text effective until March 27, 2011, see above.] The secretary of labor and workforce development, subject to approval by the governor, shall appoint a deputy director of apprentice training. The deputy director may appoint and employ such clerical, technical and professional assistance as shall be necessary to effectuate the purposes of this chapter, and may utilize any federal funds available to aid in the administration of this chapter.
